pages.text: 流體運輸器可用於運輸流體。您需要在提取側和插入側放置轉運體。$(br2)多個流體運輸器可以在同一格方塊中，它們具有插入模式和提取模式。要更改模式，您需要右鍵點擊中間區域。

You can filter things interacting in the GUI with blacklist and whitelist modes. $(br2)To remove upgrades or a transporter you can Sneak + Right + Clicking one of the transporters. $(br2)In regulator mode when a transporter is in insertion mode you can specify how many items/fluid an inventory can have.
You can speed how fast a transporter work with Speed Addons and you can transfer more using Efficiency Addons by right-clicking them in the outer ring of the transporter.
